attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please make it possible for the makers of cremola foam, Nestle UK (Rowntree's)to reserect the product in all the flavours, Raspberry, Lemon, Apple, Cola, Cider, and Orange!
Thanks

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
